full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR THABS BUM GTER CHO GA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,'GRO BA'I BDE SDUG LAS KYIS SKYED MOD KYANG, ,LAS KYIS 'BRAS BU 'BYIN PA RKYEN LA LTOS, ,RKYEN SEL RIM 'GRO 'JIG RTEN CHOS SO ZHES, ,SMOD PAR BYED RNAMS RANG NYID BLUN BAR KRAG ,'DZAM GLING BDE SKYID MA DROS GNAM PA'I KLU'I, ,MTHU ZHES RGYAL BAS GSUNG PHYIR GNAD THES NA, ,LHA KLU MCHOD PA'ANG DON CHUNG MA YIN PAS, ,RANG MTHONG LUS KYIS KHENGS RNAMS SMRA BA SKYANGS, ,@013B RANG GZHAN PHAN BDE SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,BUM GTER CHO GA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG 'DI, ,SBYAR BA'I DGE BAS 'JIG RTEN THAMS CAD DU, ,BKRA SHIS DGE MTSAN RTAG TU RGYAS PAR SHOG ,'DI YANG RTA MGRIN CHOS SKOR YANG LAG TU, ,YUL PHYOGS 'DI DANG DUS 'DI'I SKYE BO'I KHROD, ,BYA ROG LUS DKAR BRTUL ZHUGS NYAR 'DZIN PA, ,^DHARMA BADZRA ZHES BYA'I SNYOMS LAS PAS, ,RMA CHEN SBOM RA'I SRAS MCHOG SENG MTHO YI, ,LHA ZHOL ME TOG BKRA BA'I DGA' TSAL DU, ,MDZES BYED CHU STOD NYAL SBYAR BA STE, ,YI GE'I BYED PO BLO BZANG KUN DGA'O,, ,,
